column3: instead of mother.  Said it changed his life and signaled that his mother would stop bothering him.
Started drinking and smoking Pot. Allegedly had something to do with the murder of a homeless man.
Started stalking and harassing pretty girls.
Dropped out of high school
Mother Remarried, He did not like step-father.
Was legally emancipated from his mother
Worked 2 jobs to support himself
Moved back to Texas
Met “love of his life” Gina Lynn Worley
Gina and Shore were married
First child Amber was born.  Amber was autistic.
Second child Tiffany was born
Kidnapped sexually assaulted  and strangled 15-year-old Laurie Lee Tremblay
Dumped body of Laurie Lee Tremblay next to dumpster behind Nina’s Restaurant.
Kidnapped sexually assaulted  and strangled 21-year-old Carmen Estrada
Shore confesses to Gina that he has been having an affair and leaves his family
Broke into home and rapes a 16-year-old girl. (name not disclosed to protect the victim)
Starts dating 18-year-old Amy Lynch
Kidnapped sexually assaulted and strangled 9 year old Diana Rebollar.
Daughters accused Shore of molesting them
Kidnapped, raped and strangled Dana Sanchez
Shore marries Amy Lynch after 3 years of living together.
Child molestation charges were filed against Shore for the molestation of his two daughters

Shore appears in court and accepted a plea bargain.  He is fined and escapes prison time.  He is listed as a sexual offender and gets probation.  He is told that he must submit a DNA sample to the police.
Started to write an autobiographical journal which (among other things) stated his attraction to his daughters.
Told his wife, Amy, that he was uneasy about giving a DNA sample and that they were going to leave America in a boat.

Amy stays married to Shore even though he starts physically intimidating her.  He wants to choke her when they have sex.  He then proceeds to drug her and choke her while they are having sex. 
Amy believes that he intended on killing her and the fact that she faked passing out is the only thing that stopped him from killing her.
Amy files for divorce
